title: Pilot officer Rashid Minhas live up to great traditions of PAF: DG ISPR
content:
RAWALPINDI, Aug 20 (APP): Director General Inter Services Public Relations (DG ISPR) Major General Babar Iftikhar on Thursday paid tribute to Pilot Officer Rashid Minhas Shaheed and said he lived up to great traditions of Pakistan Air Force serving the motherland.
In a tweet, the ISPR DG said, “Today we remember supreme sacrifice of Pilot Officer Rashid Minhas Shaheed (Nishan-e-Haider) in the line of duty.”
The tweet was followed by the hash tag #OurMartyrsOurHeroes.
